text: "Everytime" is the third single released off of Britney Spears' fourth album In the Zone. It was released in early 2004. It was co-written by Spears herself. It hit the top 40 of the Billboard Hot 100. Category:Britney Spears songs Category:Kelly Clarkson songs Category:2004 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Pop ballads
title: Everytime
